description: Resamples the temporal dimension. If the dimension is not set, the data cube is expected to only have one temporal dimension.

dimension.description:
The temporal dimension to resample. If the dimension is not set, the data cube is expected to only have one temporal dimension.

**Note:** The default dimensions a data cube provides are described in the collection's metadata field `cube:dimensions`.

returns.description: A data cube with potentially lower temporal resolution and potentially lower cardinality, but the same number of dimensions as the original data cube.

links.title: Information about the supported temporal formats.
Resampling explained in the openEO glossary
